main event: A very bright object was observed in the sky over Albany, Oregon on December 25, 1964.
interesting points: The observation lasted for 15 minutes, The object was reported to be moving in a southwesterly direction, The observation was officially reported to the Albany police, The sighting was classified under Project Blue Book, The report consisted of a filled-out record card without any photographs.
sighted object: one very bright object in the sky
